channel.title: Inquiry about a possible projects cost
channel.description:
[quote] Name: Devon Kelly
Message: Hi there,
I was wondering if you would be able to give me a quote on a mass drop style website, with a few social features in addition to a calendar with options to vote on each item in the time line?
I'm not sure how much information I should be including in this for your, but if you want to chat about it, feel free to add me on skype (no google voice as I'm out of the states)
Skype:uhoniakupo
Regards
Devon [/quote]

item.title: Inquiry about a possible projects cost
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Please, Devon, do read www.cregox.com/your-home in case you haven't. That already answers most of your questions, and maybe a few you didn't have!

I have no clue on what you mean by "a mass drop style website" so links and screenshots showing references would be required.

Social features is a nice point in squarespace, they're really easy to add.

And calendar with options to vote on each item might be tricky, but it's sure doable. To have a better dimension on how you want this, again, please add links, screenshots or sketches of how you envision this.

After this, we may talk on skype if you want: caue.rego

Cheers!

Read full topic
item.source: Inquiry about a possible projects cost
